text: These are the official results of the Men's 20 km Walk event at the 1993 World Championships in Stuttgart, Germany. There were a total of 48 participating athletes, with the final held on Sunday August 15, 1993. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Valentí Massana Spain (ESP) |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Giovanni De Benedictis Italy (ITA) |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Daniel Plaza Spain (ESP) |} ==Abbreviations== *All times shown are in hours:minutes:seconds {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |DNS || did not start |- |NM || no mark |- |WR || world record |- |AR || area record |- |NR || national record |- |PB || personal best |- |SB || season best |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font- size:110%;" width="80%" |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 1993 World Athletics Championships |- | World Record || || 1:18.13 || September 16, 1990 || Hildesheim, Germany |- | Event Record || || 1:19.37 || August 24, 1991 || Tokyo, Japan |} ==Intermediates== ==Final ranking== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; title: 1993 World Championships in Athletics – Men's 20 kilometres walk
